nodes.id: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

zh-cn: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会国防动员部的下属机构，负责该部的综合业务。
description.en: A subordinate body of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission, responsible for the department's general affairs.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会国防动员部

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会国防动员部

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的职能部门之一，在深化国防和军队改革中组建。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission, established during the deepening of national defense and military reform.

description.zh-cn: 2015年起由习近平领导的针对中国人民解放军的全面改革。
description.en: A comprehensive reform of the People's Liberation Army led by Xi Jinping starting in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中央军委国防动员部办公厅主任。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, former Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中央军委国防动员部办公厅主任及国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army, former Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission and former Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大校，曾任中央军委国防动员部办公厅副主任。
description.en: A senior colonel in the People's Liberation Army, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大校，曾任中央军委国防动员部办公厅副主任。
description.en: A senior colonel in the People's Liberation Army, former Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院与中央军事委员会的议事协调机构，负责组织领导全国的国防动员工作。
description.en: A deliberative and coordinating body of the State Council and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, responsible for organizing and leading the nation's defense mobilization efforts.

nodes.id: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

zh-cn: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家国防动员委员会的办事机构，负责国防动员的综合计划、组织协调等工作。
description.en: The administrative office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission, responsible for comprehensive planning, organization, and coordination of national defense mobilization.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部动员部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部动员部

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军总参谋部下属的二级部门，负责全军的动员工作。
description.en: A former second-level department under the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army, responsible for the mobilization work of the entire military.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部部长、国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任和国家人民武装动员办公室主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department, Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission, and Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部部长、国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任和国家人民武装动员办公室主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department, Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission, and Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部部长、国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任和国家人民武装动员办公室主任等职。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who held positions including Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department, Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission, and Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部部长、国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任和国家人民武装动员办公室主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department, Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission, and Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任和国家人民武装动员办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission and Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军委人民武装委员会

zh-cn: 中央军委人民武装委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会下设的委员会，其日常工作由总参谋部动员部承办。
description.en: A committee under the Central Military Commission, whose daily affairs were handled by the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

nodes.id: 国家人民武装动员办公室

zh-cn: 国家人民武装动员办公室
国家国防动员委员会人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家国防动员委员会下设的办公室，负责制定人民武装动员建设的计划与规划。
description.en: An office under the National Defence Mobilization Commission, responsible for formulating plans and programs for the development of people's armed forces mobilization.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部部长及国家人民武装动员办公室主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department and Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部副部长及国家人民武装动员办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Deputy Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department and Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参谋部动员部综合局局长及国家人民武装动员办公室副主任。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, formerly served as Director of the General Bureau of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department and Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office.

relationships.source: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会国防动员部

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框及正文，中央军委国防动员部办公厅是中央军事委员会国防动员部的下属机构。
description.en: According to the infobox and main text, the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission is a subordinate body of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会国防动员部

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中，于2016年1月组建了中央军委国防动员部。
description.en: The National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission was established in January 2016 as part of the deepening national defense and military reform.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会国防动员部
relationships.target: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 中央军委国防动员部组建后，新设了中央军委国防动员部办公厅。
description.en: After the establishment of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission, the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission was newly established.

relationships.target: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 曲松于2016年出任中央军委国防动员部办公厅第一任主任，于同年9月卸任。
description.en: Qu Song became the first Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission in 2016 and left the post in September of the same year.

relationships.target: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 周河自2017年起担任中央军委国防动员部办公厅主任。
description.en: Zhou He has served as the Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission since 2017.

relationships.target: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 宋海巍于2016年至2017年4月期间担任中央军委国防动员部办公厅副主任。
description.en: Song Haiwei served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission from 2016 to April 2017.

relationships.target: 中央军委国防动员部办公厅

description.zh-cn: 何永才自2016年起担任中央军委国防动员部办公厅副主任。
description.en: He Yongcai has served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Department of the Central Military Commission since 2016.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 为加强规划、协调工作，国家国防动员委员会于2000年1月28日成立了国家国防动员委员会综合办公室作为其办事机构。
description.en: To strengthen planning and coordination, the National Defence Mobilization Commission established the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission on January 28, 2000, as its administrative body.

relationships.source: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室
relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室是国家国防动员委员会的办事机构，在其直接领导下工作。
description.en: The General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission is the administrative body of the National Defence Mobilization Commission and operates under its direct leadership.

relationships.source: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部动员部

description.zh-cn: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室曾设在中国人民解放军总参谋部动员部。
description.en: The General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission was located within the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 范晓光于2000年至2003年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Fan Xiaoguang served as the Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from 2000 to 2003, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 赵建中于2004年至2007年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Zhao Jianzhong served as the Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from 2004 to 2007, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 白自兴于2007年至2010年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Bai Zixing served as the Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from 2007 to 2010, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 牟明滨于2010年至2016年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Mou Mingbin served as the Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from 2010 to 2016, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 黄义昌自2001年起担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: Huang Yichang served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission starting in 2001.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 汪金玉曾担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任，于2007年卸任。
description.en: Wang Jinyu served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission until 2007.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 张汝涛于2008年至2010年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: Zhang Rutao served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from 2008 to 2010.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 王文清于2010年12月至2011年7月期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: Wang Wenqing served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from December 2010 to July 2011.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 田义祥于2011年7月至2013年4月期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: Tian Yixiang served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from July 2011 to April 2013.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 曲松于2013年7月至2015年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: Qu Song served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from July 2013 to 2015.

relationships.target: 国家国防动员委员会综合办公室

description.zh-cn: 董武于2015年至2016年期间担任国家国防动员委员会综合办公室副主任。
description.en: Dong Wu served as the Deputy Director of the General Office of the National Defence Mobilization Commission from 2015 to 2016.

relationships.source: 中央军委人民武装委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部动员部

description.zh-cn: 中央军委人民武装委员会的日常工作由中国人民解放军总参谋部动员部承办。
description.en: The daily affairs of the People's Armed Forces Committee of the Central Military Commission were handled by the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 1994年11月，国家国防动员委员会成立时设立了国家人民武装动员办公室。
description.en: In November 1994, the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office was established at the same time as the National Defence Mobilization Commission.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 谭冬生于1994年至1996年期间担任国家人民武装动员办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Tan Dongsheng served as the Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office from 1994 to 1996, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 范晓光于1996年至2003年期间担任国家人民武装动员办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Fan Xiaoguang served as the Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office from 1996 to 2003, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 赵建中于2004年至2007年期间担任国家人民武装动员办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Zhao Jianzhong served as the Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office from 2004 to 2007, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 白自兴于2007年至2010年期间担任国家人民武装动员办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Bai Zixing served as the Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office from 2007 to 2010, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 牟明滨于2010年至2016年期间担任国家人民武装动员办公室主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部部长。
description.en: Mou Mingbin served as the Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office from 2010 to 2016, concurrently holding the position of Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 姜诗坤曾担任国家人民武装动员办公室副主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部副部长。
description.en: Jiang Shikun served as the Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office, concurrently holding the position of Deputy Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 白自兴曾担任国家人民武装动员办公室副主任至2007年，同时兼任总参谋部动员部副部长。
description.en: Bai Zixing served as the Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office until 2007, concurrently holding the position of Deputy Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 汪金玉于2007年至2010年4月期间担任国家人民武装动员办公室副主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部副部长。
description.en: Wang Jinyu served as the Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office from 2007 to April 2010, concurrently holding the position of Deputy Director of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 国家人民武装动员办公室

description.zh-cn: 杨春国曾担任国家人民武装动员办公室副主任，同时兼任总参谋部动员部综合局局长。
description.en: Yang Chunguo served as the Deputy Director of the National People's Armed Forces Mobilization Office, concurrently holding the position of Director of the General Bureau of the Mobilization Department of the General Staff Department.
